resources.string: Connect to Google Play-services can not be success.
You must have ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION to get some features.
Can not get your current location.
Keep going to pin a location on map by Long-Tap and try to move your body near to this location to get fence. Click [cancel] to reverse all and no pin no fence.
Close now and last fence will be lost.
Click device [Home] to let this app background run and you can get fence.
